lines: The Lord bless you, my son.
As I see it, you are traveling in this wicked region without God's grace.
That is a foolish approach and your journey will end in disgrace and disaster.
Let me lend you a guiding hand, for we live in dark times.
options: Promise a place in your carriage

lines: Thank you. I shall see you on board.
May the lord have mercy on your ways.
...and may you not perish from your wounds.
